attributes.action: Ban the use of all none recyclable packaging
attributes.additional_details: I know that this a monumental thing to ask for however at least a step in the right direction is needed to save us all and the planet that we live on.
attributes.background: It is ridiculous how in a world on the brink of environmental disaster you can walk into a super market and see so many products wrapped in layer upon layer of non-recyclable plastics and other non-recyclable packaging. Something needs to be done.
